Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,(##class(%CSP.Response).HyperEventBody()) Write !,"
",! Write "",! Write "
Строки документа",! Write "",! Write !,"" Write !,!,"" Write !,"
",! If '(silent'="true") Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !,"
" Write !,"
Да
" Write "   " Write !,"
Отмена
" Write "
",! %csp00001 ;} Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s source=%request.Get("source") s:source'="" sourceClass=##class(Docs.Action).GetClassFromSource(source) s DocType=##class(Docs.Action).GetDocNameFromClass("Docs.Diff") s silent=%request.Get("silent") Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,!,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"var Arguments=window.dialogArguments.split(InnerSplitter);",! Write "var ClassName=Arguments[0];",! Write "var DocID=ReturnSpace(Arguments[1]);",! Write "var DocType="""_(DocType)_""";",! Write "//alert(""ClassName=""+ClassName+""\nDocID=""+DocID+""\nDocType=""+DocType)",! Write "var source="""_(source)_""";",! Write "var sourceClass="""_($G(sourceClass))_""";",! Write "if((source=="""")&&(DocID=="""")){",! Write " alert(""Акт расхождения не может быть создан отдельно."");",! Write " window.close();}",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "PropTable.ClassName=ClassName;",! Write "TypDocument.innerText=DocType;",! Write "if(source!=""""){var srcdoc=source+""@""+sourceClass;}",! Write "else{var srcdoc="""";}",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs("""",DocID,""Dat,Tim,Stat,Source,DocType,User1"",srcdoc);",! Write "docstr.ClassName=ClassName+""Items"";",! Write "docstr.attachEvent(""onAddColumns"",loadgoods2);",! Write "docstr.LoadHeadersXML(""Doc,DocType"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"function loadgoods2(){",! Write "if(source!=""""){var doc=source}",! Write "else{var doc=DocID}",! Write "docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.GetStrFromDoc"",doc,2,ClassName)",! Write "}",! Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var ok=SplitSendXml("""",ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""");",! Write "//docstrData=docstr.GetData(""rows"");",! Write "//docstrTypes=docstr.GetDataProps(""Type"");",! Write "//docstrNames=docstr.GetDataProps(""Name"")+""~"";",! Write "//PropTableData=PropTable.GetData(""cols"");",! Write "//PropTableTypes=PropTable.ColumnTypes(1);",! Write "//PropTableNames=PropTable.names;",! Write "//ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.CreateDoc:csp.docdiff"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',ClassName,"""",PropTableData,PropTableNames,PropTableTypes,docstrData,docstrNames,docstrTypes)",! Write "//создатель документа вернёт его ID",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){",! Write " alert(ok);",! Write "}",! Write "else{",! Write " if(source!=""""){",! Write " var ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.SetSourceDoc:csp.docdiff"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',ClassName,ok,source)",! Write " if(isNaN(ok))alert(ok)",! Write " }",! Write " returnValue=1;",! Write " window.close();",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function addtovars(){",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""selectgoods2.csp"","""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "if(WinResult==null)return",! Write "WinResult=WinResult.split(StringSplitter)",! Write "var FieldCaption = new Array();",! Write "var FieldValue = new Array();",! Write "for(i=0 ; i<WinResult.length-1 ; i++){",! Write " var onestr=WinResult[i].split(InnerSplitter);",! Write " FieldCaption[""Goods""]=onestr[1];",! Write " FieldValue[""Goods""]=onestr[0];",! Write " docstr.AddRow(FieldCaption,FieldValue);",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write "</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2 XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
